title: New OG Pixel XL bought from AliExpress is not new
content:
I bought a "so-called" brand new unlocked US variant of Pixel XL from a store, and received it. Upon inspection, it seems that the phone I bought is neither new nor unlocked.

So I contacted the seller for a refund, but I was responded as following:

"Please provide the official inspection statement from the brand owner to prove that the phone is refurbished. Thanks."

So here I am asking if I am wrong. Can I get my phone verified its condition?
I am 99% sure that the phone i bought is not new. But please advice me if what I discovered is right.
